Pineapple

Project Title

Be Winccible

Description

Be winccible is an online model porfolio project. I am personally a commercial model. So I am developing this porfolio for myself and adapt to my name "Wincci". It has a very creative fold out navigation along with the hamburger menu. Large type in web design is applied too. This project demonstrates my learning of SCSS development.

Technologies

CSS Only, SCSS, UI/UX Design

Year

2017
